name: Bunny Run (pocketAL)
description:
Prototype of my first mobile game. 

This was a one afternoon project, but I plan to continue working on it to improve design and add more effects.

This game can be run on an Android device only. 

Assets used for this game:

Characters: Kawaii Slimes | 3D Creatures | Unity Asset Store

Environment: Free Low Poly Nature Forest | 3D Landscapes | Unity Asset Store

Font: Sunny Spells Font | Niskala Huruf | FontSpace

Music: OpenGameArt.org
